attributes.additional_details: Reduce the taxes and duty which is paid on fuel across the UK to come into line with the rest of the EU. The UK is one of the highest payers of duty in the whole of the EU if not the world. THIS MUST STOP. In one litre of petrol or diesel, over 50% of this is taken by the government in taxes and fuel duty. Help to combat the abuse of taxes on everyday necessities.
